data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural changes in the family Membracidae (Hemiptera, Auchenorrhyncha, Membracoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Dmitriev, Dmitry A., Deitz, Lewis L. (2017): Nomenclatural changes in the family Membracidae (Hemiptera, Auchenorrhyncha, Membracoidea). Zootaxa 4365 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4365.1.7
